thread.title: Poised to Wield Executive Power, Make Immigration Changes...
thread.title_full: Poised to Wield Executive Power, Make Immigration Changes...

title: Poised to Wield Executive Power, Make Immigration Changes...

organizations.name: u.s. trump poised to wield executive power

text:
U.S. Trump Poised to Wield Executive Power to Make Immigration Changes President can act on his own to deport more people, jump-start the border wall or restrict immigration from Syria By Laura Meckler Updated Jan. 22, 2017 7:07 p.m. ET 
President Donald Trump is soon expected to seek sharp changes in U.S. immigration policy by using his executive power, echoing the politically contentious approach taken by Barack Obama. 
The new Trump administration released its first executive actions on Inauguration Day, regarding the Affordable Care Act and on regulations across the government. More are expected as soon as this week on issues ranging from environmental to labor... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
